title: BRIEF-Bluebird Bio And Celgene Corporation To Co-Develop Anti-Bcma Car T Cell Therapy Bb2121 In The U.S.
text:
20 PM / in 2 minutes BRIEF-Bluebird Bio And Celgene Corporation To Co-Develop Anti-Bcma Car T Cell Therapy Bb2121 In The U.S. Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
  Bluebird Bio Inc: 
* BLUEBIRD BIO AND CELGENE CORPORATION ENTER INTO AGREEMENT TO CO-DEVELOP AND CO-PROMOTE ANTI-BCMA CAR T CELL THERAPY BB2121 IN THE UNITED STATES 
* ‍BLUEBIRD AND CELGENE WILL SHARE 50% OF U.S. COSTS AND PROFITS​ 
* ‍BLUEBIRD TO RECEIVE MILESTONES AND ROYALTIES ON EX-U.S. SALES​
